pages.text: Ars Nouveau is a magic mod that allows you to craft spells, summon magical creatures, and create magical devices. $(br2)Harness the arcane arts to build powerful tools and automate your base!
Start by crafting a Worn Notebook, which serves as your guide to Ars Nouveau. $(br2)Gather source gems and Nipa to begin your journey into the world of spellcraft.
Nipa, a mystical plant used in many spells, can only be found on the ground. $(br2)The sky islands where Nipa once grew have mysteriously disappeared, adding to the intrigue of Ars Nouveau.
Explore ancient ruins, craft powerful glyphs, and uncover the secrets of magical creatures. $(br2)With Ars Nouveau, the world is your magical playground!

There are a number of add-on mods expanding Ars Nouveau: $(br2)- Ars Creo: Adds creative spells and constructs. $(br)- Ars Elemental: Introduces elemental magic and new glyphs. $(br)- Ars Energistique: Integrates Applied Energistics 2 with spell automation.
